full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THEG PA CHEN PO RGYUD BLA MA'I BSTAN BCOS BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @080A *, ,(THEG PA CHEN PO RGYUD BLA MA'I BSTAN BCOS MGON PO BYAMS PAS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,DPAL GRONG KHYER DPE MED KYI MKHAS PA CHEN PO BRAM ZE RIN CHEN RDO RJE'I DBON PO PAndI TA MKHAS PA CHEN PO SAD DZNY'A NA DANG, ,LO TZTSA BA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO LDAN SHES RAB KYIS GRONG KHYER DPE MED DU BSGYUR BA'O,, ,,)
translator_(орчуулагч): SAD DZNY'A NA, BLO LDAN SHES RAB,
